message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be a valuable asset for your business. My asking price is $1,750,000. This price reflects the significant value and potential of this product. I'm confident it will be a wise investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget, $1,400,000 is still a bit below my expectations.  Considering the product's value and potential, I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects both our interests.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $1,600,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,550,000. I think this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
